Translations.Text: He dictus O my people quod ego habet solid proof ex my Dominus mercy Eum? Qui support me DEUS ego disobeyed Eum? Vos unus augment my loss
O my people hoc est deus camel serve prout proof pro vos. Vos let eam eat deus terra perfecit non touch eam any harm lest vos incur immediate retribution
They slaughtered eam. He tunc dictus Vos habet unus 3 feria vivens Hoc est prophecy est inevitable
When noster judgment advenit nos saved Saaleh those believed eum mercy nos humiliation ut feria. Tuus Dominus est the Multus Powerful Almighty
Those transgressed annihilated disaster sinister them their domus peritus
Est prout si they nunquam vivens ibi. Indeed Thamoud rejected their Dominus. Absolutely Thamoud incurred their annihilation
When noster messengers iit Abraham bonus news they dictus Pax. He dictus Pax soon brought roasted calf
When he vide their manus non touch it he became suspicious fearful de them. They dictus est afraid nos dispatched people Lot
His uxor standing she laughed when nos dedit eam bonus news Isaac post Isaac Jacob
